SELECT hosp_id AS id, hosp_name AS name, hosp_address AS address, hosp_tel AS tel, hosp_department AS dept, hosp_lat AS lat, hosp_lng AS lng FROM hosp_info WHERE hosp_lat IS NOT NULL AND hosp_lng IS NOT NULL
AND hosp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND hosp_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area}, '%')
AND hosp_department LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dept}, '%')

SELECT hosp_id AS id, hosp_name AS name, hosp_address AS address, hosp_tel AS tel, hosp_department AS dept, hosp_type AS type, hosp_lat AS lat, hosp_lng AS lng FROM hosp_info WHERE 1 = 1
AND hosp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND hosp_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area}, '%')
AND hosp_department LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dept}, '%')
AND hosp_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{type}, '%')
